text: Approval for a new bone cement formulation, in order to change the cement's handling characteristics.  The device is indicated for the fixation of prostheses to living bone in Orthopaedic musculoskeletal surgical procedures for rheumatoid arthritis, osteoarthritis, traumatic arthritis, osteoporosis, avascular necrosis, collagen disease, severe joint destruction secondary to trauma or other conditions, and revision of previous arthroplasty.
